The company offers general purpose servers for multi-workload computing and workload-optimized servers; HPE ProLiant rack and tower servers; HPE BladeSystem, HPE Synergy, and HPE ProLiant; storage solutions; and solutions for secondary workloads and traditional tape, storage networking, and disk products, such as HPE Modular Storage Arrays and HPE XP. It also offers HPE Apollo and Cray products; and HPE Superdome Flex, HPE Nonstop, HPE Integrity, HPE Moonshot, and HPE Edgeline products. Additionally, the company provides mobility and Internet of Things solutions under the Aruba brand, which include Wi-Fi access points, switches, routers, and sensors; such as cloud-based management, network management, network access control, analytics and assurance, and location services; and professional and support services, as well as as-a-service and consumption models for the intelligent edge portfolio of products. In addition, it offers various leasing, financing, IT consumption, and utility programs and asset management services for customers to facilitate technology deployment models and the acquisition of complete IT solutions, including hardware, software, and services from Hewlett Packard Enterprise and others. Further, the company invests in communications and media solutions, Hewlett Packard labs, and various business incubation projects. It serves commercial and large enterprise groups, including business and public sector enterprises; and through various partners comprising resellers, distribution partners, original equipment manufacturers, independent software vendors, systems integrators, and advisory firms. The company has strategic alliances with The Swiss National Supercomputing Centre and NVIDIA; Citrix Systems, Inc.; and Wipro Limited. Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.

2I4.F.summary: TagMaster AB (publ), a technology company, develops and sells advanced sensor systems and solutions based on radio, radar, magnetic and camera technologies under the TagMaster, CitySync, Balogh, CA Traffic, Magsys, Hikob, and Sensys Networks brand names. The company develops and markets radio frequency identification products for traffic and rail applications; and automatic number plate recognition products. Its products are used in parking and access control, security, traffic, tolling, airport, mining and port, and fleet operation areas. The company exports its products primarily to Europe, the Middle East, Asia, and North America through a network of partners, and systems integrators. TagMaster AB (publ) was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Kista, Sweden.

2IU.F.summary: Boxlight Corporation, an education technology company, develops, sells, and services interactive classroom solutions for the education market worldwide. The company provides a range of interactive classroom technology products primarily targeted at the K-12 education market. Its products include interactive projectors, interactive flat panel displays, interactive touch projectors, noninteractive projectors, touchboards, and MimioTeach that could turn any whiteboard interactive; and accessory document cameras, teacher pads for remote control, and assessment systems. The company also offers MimioStudio Interactive Instructional Software that enables the creation, editing, and presentation of interactive instructional lessons and activities; MimioMobile, a software accessory for MimioStudio; Oktopus Instructional and Whiteboarding Software that enables the creation, editing, and presentation of interactive instructional lessons and activities; Notes+, a software accessory for use with Oktopus software; and GameZones and MimioInteract, which are multi-student interactive gaming software. In addition, it offers MimioClarity that distributes audio around the classroom and integrates with the front-of-class display; Mimio MyBot system that bridges the gap between learning about robotics in the classroom and the application of robotics; Robo3D printers; MyStemKits, which offers standards-driven lesson plans for grades K-12 math and science teachers; and MimioView document camera, as well as peripherals and accessories, such as amplified speaker systems, mobile carts, installation accessories, and wall-mount accessories for interactive and standard projectors, and LED flat panels. Further, the company distributes interactive projectors and LED flat panels; and provides classroom training, professional development, and educator certification services. The company was formerly known as Logical Choice Corporation. Boxlight Corporation was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Lawrenceville, Georgia.

2JD.F.summary: Maxar Technologies Inc. provides earth intelligence and space infrastructure solutions in the United States, Asia, South America, Europe, the Middle East, Australia, Canada, and internationally. It operates through Earth Intelligence and Space Infrastructure segments. The Earth Intelligence segment offers earth imagery products, including orthorectified imagery, imagery basemap, 3D and elevation, and information products; and SecureWatch, a subscription offering that provides online access to imagery and geospatial intelligence platform. This segment also offers geospatial information, application, and analytic services. It serves U.S. and other international government agencies, such as defense and intelligence agencies, as well as commercial customers in various markets. The Space Infrastructure segment provides space based infrastructure, robotics, sub-systems, and information solutions, including communication and imaging satellites and payloads; platforms for space exploration and hosting instruments for earth science; space subsystems for power, propulsion, and communication; satellite ground systems and support services; space-based remote sensory solutions; space robotics; and defense systems. This segment serves government agencies and satellite operators. Maxar Technologies Inc. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Westminster, Colorado.

2W9.F.summary: Sonim Technologies, Inc. provides ruggedized mobile phones and accessories for task workers. It offers ruggedized mobile phones, such as Sonim XP8, Sonim XP5s, and Sonim XP3 based on the Android platform that are capable of attaching to public and private wireless networks; industrial-grade accessories, including remote speaker microphones, multi-bay charging accessories, and in-vehicle hands-free voice communications solutions; cloud-based software and application services; and Rapid Deployment Kit, a portable communications system. The company also provides SmartScanner products, such as Sonim RS60, an Android-based handheld computer and LTE device; and Sonim RS80, an Android-based tablet. Sonim Technologies, Inc. sells its mobile phones and accessories primarily to wireless carriers in the United States and Canada; and sells ruggedized phones, barcode scanners, and accessories through distribution channels in North America, South America, and Europe. The company serves transportation and logistics, construction, manufacturing, facilities management, energy and utility, and public sectors. The company was formerly known as NaviSpin.com, Inc. and changed its name to Sonim Technologies, Inc. in December 2001. Sonim Technologies, Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Austin, Texas.

2W9.SG.summary: Sonim Technologies, Inc. provides ruggedized mobile phones and accessories for task workers. It offers ruggedized mobile phones, such as Sonim XP8, Sonim XP5s, and Sonim XP3 based on the Android platform that are capable of attaching to public and private wireless networks; industrial-grade accessories, including remote speaker microphones, multi-bay charging accessories, and in-vehicle hands-free voice communications solutions; cloud-based software and application services; and Rapid Deployment Kit, a portable communications system. The company also provides SmartScanner products, such as Sonim RS60, an Android-based handheld computer and LTE device; and Sonim RS80, an Android-based tablet. Sonim Technologies, Inc. sells its mobile phones and accessories primarily to wireless carriers in the United States and Canada; and sells ruggedized phones, barcode scanners, and accessories through distribution channels in North America, South America, and Europe. The company serves transportation and logistics, construction, manufacturing, facilities management, energy and utility, and public sectors. The company was formerly known as NaviSpin.com, Inc. and changed its name to Sonim Technologies, Inc. in December 2001. Sonim Technologies, Inc. was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Austin, Texas.

300038.SZ.summary: Beijing Shuzhi Technology Co., Ltd. provides communication products in China and internationally. The company primarily offers communication towers, infrastructure construction, and maintenance and operation of site management to operators and social customers, such as government, municipal, public security, etc. It also provides personal, financial, and property stewardship services, as well as smart city services based on the site platform. The company was formerly known as Beijing Miteno Communication Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Beijing Shuzhi Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2018. Beijing Shuzhi Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300074.SZ.summary: AVCON Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides video products and application solutions in China and internationally. The company offers online education products, such as online classroom server and terminal, and classroom camera; digital operating room center servers, integrated operating room terminals, and digital medical teaching terminals; video banking products; emergency command products; and recording servers, audio processors, microphones, and keyboards. It also provides network video service systems using Internet cloud and networking technology; and develops and markets of multimedia communications, intelligent video analysis, electronic whiteboards, and cloud computing. In addition, the company is involved in the design and sale of computer hardware and software, and electronic products; provision of computer systems integration services; development, transfer, consultation, and technical service of computer, network video, communications, and systems integration technology; and design and construction of public security and intelligent engineering projects. Further, it engages in the planning and designing, constructing, operating, technology developing, and technical servicing of smart city projects; development of IoT technology; and designing, installing, constructing, and maintaining of safety-related engineering; and leases equipment and related technical services. The company also provides smart city-related software, hardware services, and peripherals; communications equipment procurement and after-sales services; security engineering installation services; and video monitoring systems. It serves government, military, armed police, fire, banking, insurance, education, medical, telecommunications, energy, manufacturing, and other industries. AVCON Information Technology Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

300079.SZ.summary: Sumavision Technologies Co.,Ltd. provides video and broadband solutions to various markets worldwide. Its DTV head-end hardware products include enhanced multimedia router, a video processing platform that provides solution for encoding, decoding, multiplexing, modulating, demodulating, scrambling, descrambling, and statistical multiplexing of SD and HD MPEG video; high density edge QAM modulator for cable digital television broadcasting and VOD systems; D8120 integrated receiver decoder; E8310 and HEVC 4K/HD multi-channel encoders; multiplexer and scramblers; modulators; The company also offers encoding and transcoding products, such as real-time transcoding, offline transcoding, and media gateway systems; stream guard security systems; IPTV/OTT head-end products, including CDN and streaming systems and back-office systems; access network products, such as CMTS, OLTs, network management systems, cable modems, and ONU products; and IPTV/OTT terminals. Sumavision Technologies Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

300081.SZ.summary: Hengxin Shambala Culture Co.,Ltd. engages in CG and CV technology business. It is involved in the CG/VR content production; children's whole industry chain development and operation; and LBE city new entertainment products. The company was formerly known as Hengxin Mobile Business Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hengxin Shambala Culture Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Hengxin Shambala Culture Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

300098.SZ.summary: Gosuncn Technology Group Co., Ltd. provides IoT products and services for public security and smart city industries primarily in China. The company offers products in the areas of smart cities, safe cities, intelligent transportation, law enforcement supervision, wireless communications, communications security, financial security, and railway security. It also provides services for departments of public security, and traffic police and railway; and banks, operators, and other industries. In addition, the company offers public information security, information technology software management, video image analysis, public security information and communication network information security, police cloud platform storage, and automotive electronics logo services, as well as augmented reality systems. Gosuncn Technology Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300101.SZ.summary: Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. provides satellite navigation components and terminals. It offers Beidou satellite navigation application key components, integrated circuits, Beidou satellite navigation terminals, and Beidou satellite navigation and positioning application systems, as well as network security monitoring solutions. The company also provides solutions for photography, security, satellite communications, and other fields; indoor positioning systems; and location-based precision digital service platform. Its products are used in national defense, geology, electric power, transportation, public safety, communications, water conservancy, forestry, and other professional applications. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Gotecom Electronical Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. in September 2014. Chengdu CORPRO Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300134.SZ.summary: Anhui Tatfook Technology Co.,Ltd provides mobile communication equipment, intelligent terminals, and automobiles in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers as 5G and Internet of Things products, including smart terminals, such as electronics, automobiles, and graphite products; and base station supporting devices, network optimization system devices, and radio frequency products and antennas. It also provides machining, 3D printing, NPL language and design platform, and NPL CAD design services; and education services. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Tatfook Technology Co., Ltd and changed its name to Anhui Tatfook Technology Co.,Ltd in April 2020. Anhui Tatfook Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300136.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunway Communication Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of mobile terminal antennas and related modules, acoustic modules, and connectors. The company offers NFC, AP, BOX, GPS, insert molding, LDS, MIA, stamping, and FPC antennas; and precision metal products, including stamping and MIM products. It also provides connectors, connecting cables and components, and high frequency cables; acoustic products comprising speakers and receivers; soft magnetic materials, including ferrite, metal polymer, amorphous, and nanocrystalline materials; and cables, such as automotive, interconnection, USB type C, RF, and MFI cables, as well as cables for industrial equipment. In addition, the company offers spring contact clips in various shapes. Its products are used in consumer electronics, such as smartphones/tablet PCs, smart wearable devices, smart home/IoT products, and smart automobiles; and military fields. Shenzhen Sunway Communication Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300167.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Dvision Co.,Ltd. provides smart video and IoT core technology products and solutions in China. The company offers video conferencing and recording, laser display, and face recognition products; private network communication products; and various IoT products. It serves the government, public security, traffic, industrial park, education, and medical sectors. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Dvision Video Communications Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Dvision Co.,Ltd. in December 2017. Shenzhen Dvision Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300211.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yitong High-Tech Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of broadcast cable TV network equipment in China and internationally. The company provides front-end optical transmission equipment, optical workstations, optical transmission platforms, RF-PON products, optical transmitters, optical receivers, optical amplifiers, and other cable TV optical transmission equipment; and digital optical workstations, GEPON, ONU, MoCA, HomePlug and C-DOCSIS, and home gateway series products, as well as CATV coaxial cable transmission equipment, such as trunk amplifiers, passive components, and user terminals. It also offers intelligent monitoring engineering services for social security monitoring and weak electricity intelligent projects. Jiangsu Yitong High-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Changshu, China.

300213.SZ.long_name: Beijing Jiaxun Feihong Electrical Co., Ltd.
300213.SZ.summary: Beijing Jiaxun Feihong Electrical Co., Ltd. provides dispatching and control systems in China. It offers MDS3400, a dispatch commanding and communication system platform, which integrates voice and data application services; and MDS6800, a visual dispatch and command system. The company also provides IMS8000, a video surveillance system; IMS6000, a railway disaster prevention and safety monitoring solution that includes wind, rain, snow depth, obstacle intrusion, and earthquake monitoring sub-systems; and unmanned planes and robots, as well as emergency communication system. Its products are used in various industries, such as railway, national defense, urban rail transit, petroleum, petrochemical, coal, metallurgy, electric power, finance, and other industries. The company also has operations in Africa, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Beijing Jiaxun Feihong Electrical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.

300250.SZ.summary: Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co.,Ltd researches, develops, designs, produces, and sells information access equipment in China and internationally. The company provides IPRAN access equipment, including IPRAN terminal devices; RF passive components, such as power splitters, directional and hybrid couplers, coaxial terminations, attenuators, filters, combiners, diplexers, and POI products; and triple play products, such as EOC master and slave products. It also offers enterprise gateway solutions comprising PON and LAN access gateway, and IPPBX; FTTH series products, such as GPON and EPON; and Internet of machine systems. The company serves mobile, unicom, telecom, radio and television, bank and power industries, etc. Hangzhou CNCR-IT Co.,Ltd was founded in 1999 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

300252.SZ.summary: Kingsignal Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and markets standard voice signal cables, connectors, components and accessories in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers RF cables, including semi-rigid and flexible, military standard RG series, corrugated coaxial, KSR and FLL low loss, micro coaxial, MS2 low loss, tri-coaxial, CATV coaxial, test, multiple core coaxial, and stable cables, as well as commercial wires; and RF connectors, such as DIN, N, TNC, BMA, SMA, SMK, APC3.5, SMC, SAA, SSMA, etc. The company also provides circular electrical connectors, micro rectangular electrical connectors, and power cables; optical transceivers, assemblies, cables, and passive connectors; LAN cables and jumpers, and multipairs cables; circuit boards; and chip modules. Its products are used in the rail transit, new energy, industrial automation, and medical wiring harness industries. Kingsignal Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300264.SZ.summary: AVIT Ltd. manufactures and sells DVB products and solutions to network operators. It offers DVB solutions, including digital broadcasting, interactive TV, and triple-play solutions; DVB application systems, such as business management and VAS applications; digital head-end products and equipment; digital receivers and embedded software; and value-added software system and terminal products. The company also provides system design, system integration, technical training, and operation consulting services. It serves approximately 70 million subscribers in China and internationally. AVIT Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300292.SZ.summary: Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of wireless communication RF connection systems and fiber connection products. The company provides communication connection products for RF and fiber connection fields, as well as mobile communication terminal devices. It offers wireless communication RF connection system products, which primarily include RF coaxial connectors, adaptors, surge arrestors, cables and cable assemblies, and interconnect devices, such as terminal loads, as well as related connection structure parts. The company also provides optic-electric products, including optical splitters, optical fiber patch cords, optical cables, optical fiber connectors, and boxes. In addition, it offers communication antennas. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Wutong Communications Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. in October 2015. Wutong Holding Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Suzhou, China.

300310.SZ.summary: Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. provides communication network technology services and system solutions to telecom operators and equipment manufacturers in China. The company offers engineering, construction, maintenance, optimization, and other technical services for communication, wireless, transmission, and other networks; integrated, business support, and IT system solutions; tag analytics big data services; and communications big data business identification services. It also engages in the research and development of communication equipment; and production and sales business. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. Eastone Century Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300311.SZ.summary: Surfilter Network Technology Co., Ltd. provides network information security solutions in China and internationally. The company offers user entity behavior awareness solution to control and manage Internet usage. It also provides firewall, anti-virus gateway, video surveillance security gateway, intrusion prevention, unknown threat protection gateway, intrusion detection, application delivery, and security isolation and information exchange systems. In addition, the company offers network security situation awareness solutions, Website security monitoring systems, and mobile Internet application security management platforms; operation and maintenance security audit systems; network security audit, log management integrated audit, database auditing, and public area wireless Internet information security management systems; and public opinion security solutions. It serves management companies, network operators, enterprises, public institutions, and individuals. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

300312.SZ.summary: Boomsense Technology Co.,Ltd. provides wireless broadband access solutions in China. The company provides distributed, dual carrier, enterprise, outdoor, and small cell systems; multiservice distributed access system solutions, repeater series products, micro power distribution systems, and base station amplifiers; and passive devices and point of interfaces. It also offers wireless access point controllers, access points, wireless bridges, and wireless base stations; indoor antennas, base station antennas, camouflage antennas, and camouflage shells; electricity security products; and gateway terminals. Boomsense Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Beijing, China.

300322.SZ.summary: Huizhou Speed Wireless Technology Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, sells, and services wireless communication terminal antennas for mobile phone, tablet, wearable device, notebook computer, automobile, drone, security monitoring, and other applications. It offers mobile smart terminal antennas, vehicle-mounted electronic products, wireless charging products, fingerprint and sensor modules, advanced semiconductor-packaging products, precision structural parts, and testing and intelligent detection equipment. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Huizhou, China.

300330.SZ.long_name: ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd.
300330.SZ.summary: ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd. designs, develops, integrates, produces, sells, and services non-contact IC card machine products in China. The company offers rail transit systems, such as central and station computer systems. It also provides community card systems; bus card systems; and electronic ticketing solutions. In addition, the company offers intelligent supply chain management solutions. ShangHai Huahong Jitong Smart System Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shanghai, China.

300447.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co., Ltd.
300447.SZ.summary: Nanjing Quanxin Cable Technology Co., Ltd. develops and produces military optoelectronic transmission products. It offers photoelectric transmission and optical cables; photoelectric transmission cable assemblies; optoelectronic devices, such as optical and electrical connectors; and integrated wiring products. The company also provides optoelectronic system integration products, including avionics and control, and ground remote control terminal; and optical transmission systems. Its products are used in the aviation, aerospace, ships, weapons, and electronics fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

300454.SZ.summary: Sangfor Technologies Inc. provides IT infrastructure solutions in China and internationally. The company specializes in the provision of cloud computing, and network security and optimization solutions. It offers network security products, including Internet access management products; NGAF firewall platform; and SSL VPN products that provide support for remote user to access the enterprise network. The company also offers SD-WAN optimization solutions, including hardware and virtual software products for the Internet, internal WANs, public and private clouds, and hybrid networks. In addition, it provides virtual desktop infrastructure products; EasyConnect, a remote access solution, which allows the access to Windows desktops and applications; application delivery solutions for service systems; hyper-converged infrastructure solutions; and aBOS, a NFV converged gateway solution. The company serves finance and banking industry, governments, Internet service providers, schools and universities, and enterprises. Sangfor Technologies Inc. was founded in 2000 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300502.SZ.summary: Eoptolink Technology Inc., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of optical transceiver modules and optical components. Its products are used in various ICT applications, such as data center, telecom networks, security monitoring, smart grid, and others. The company operates in approximately 60 countries and regions worldwide. Eoptolink Technology Inc., Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300504.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd.
300504.SZ.summary: Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services optical and mobile communication products in China. Its products include physical links and protective devices in communication networks, broadband network terminal equipment, mobile communication network optimizing system equipment, and heat shrinkable products and communication pipes. The company also provides system integration services. Sichuan Tianyi Comheart Telecom Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300514.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development Co., Ltd.
300514.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Friendcom Technology Development Co., Ltd. provides wireless M2M solutions worldwide. The company offers low voltage power collection terminal products, including micro power wireless, power line carrier, and CFDA auxiliary equipment; intelligent power distribution products; water and gas heat meter low power modules; wireless digital radios; RF modules; water meters; gas meters; energy meters; automatic meter reading equipment; electric meters; wireless M-Bus modules; cellular network modules; LoRa products, which includes WAN modules and terminals; and sewage treatment. The company's products are used in smart grid, utility metering, wireless connectivity, and test equipment; and in the areas of smart home, intelligent security, intelligent transportation, precision agriculture, utilities meter data collection, etc. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

300531.SZ.summary: Urovo Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells mobile computers and payment terminals in China and internationally. It offers portable printers, scanners, and accessories, as well as provides terminal management software. The company also provides technical support and after sales services. Its products are used in transportation and logistics, warehousing, retail, finance, government enforcement, healthcare, and other sectors. The company was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China. Urovo Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Urovo Technology (Hong Kong) Holdings Limited.

300555.SZ.summary: Lootom Telcovideo Network (wuxi) Co., Ltd. provides network integrated solutions and services for network operators worldwide. It offers professional network planning and design, network optimization and transformation, network operation and maintenance monitoring, engineering construction, and other services. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Wuxi, China.

300565.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Kexin Communication Technologies Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, manufacture, and marketing of telecom communication network equipment in China and internationally. It offers ODN products, including no jumper optical cable cross-connecting cabinets, fiber distribution boxes, optical passive accessories, multi-media boxes, outdoor cabinets, and fiber terminal products; and wireless access products that comprise mini cabinets, fiber terminal boxes, wireless access decoration antennas, RF passive devices, and power distribution products. The company also provides integrated network cabinets consisting of fiber distribution products, traditional optical cable cross-connecting cabinets, and digital distribution frames; main distribution frames; and intelligent ODN products, including intelligent optical distribute frames, intelligent optical cable cross-connecting cabinets, intelligent fiber distribution boxes, intelligent management terminals, intelligent ODN management systems, intelligent patch cords and pigtails, and intelligent optical splitters with pigtails. In addition, it offers solutions in the areas of communication product distribution, integrated communication network, and communication network topology. Further, the company provides application solutions; and offers technical services in the areas of engineering construction, operating, and maintenance. Its products and solutions are used in FTTX, 3G/4G, and transmission networks. The company serves telecom operators, ICT equipment manufacturers, and network integrators. Shenzhen Kexin Communication Technologies Co.,Ltd was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300628.SZ.summary: Yealink Network Technology Co., Ltd. provides voice, video, and data unified communication terminal solutions worldwide. The company's product portfolio includes video conferencing systems, conference phones, smart media phones, IP phones, desktop video phones, DECT phones, Skype for business and teams phones, and accessories. It also offers device management platform that provides a set of tools for implementing the company's video and voice communication endpoint devices. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Xiamen, China.

300638.SZ.summary: Fibocom Wireless Inc. provides wireless communication modules and solutions worldwide. The company offers LPWA, GSM/GPRS, WCDMA/HSPA+, LTE, and SoC modules. It serves Internet of Things and consumer electronic segments. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

300698.SZ.summary: Wanma Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells communication electronics and communication connection equipment. Its telecom division products include optical fiber products, outdoor telecom cabinets, copper products, broadband access integrated distribution boxes, equipment cabinets, and transmission equipment use power distribution file cabinets. The company's medical division offers medical devices. Its principal products are used in various areas, such as IDC building, cloud platform, communication network, medical field, national high-speed railway, and railway transportation construction. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Linan, China.

300710.SZ.long_name: Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd.
300710.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces CATV equipment. It offers HFC optical fiber transmission products, such as switches, as well as optical receivers, amplifiers, transmitters, platforms, and optical nodes. The company also provides CATV coaxial cable transmission products comprising bidirectional building and outdoor bi-directional amplifiers, power supplies, and taps and splitters; and digital TV equipment consisting of DVB/IP stream processing devices, encoders, DVB sourcers and adapters, IPTV stream platforms, and other equipment. In addition, it offers EPON and GPON optical network equipment; PTN transmission equipment; industrial Ethernet switches; Ethernet testers; and network management software. The company sells its products in China, Europe, North America, and internationally. Hangzhou Prevail Optoelectronic Equipment Co., Ltd. is based in Hangzhou, China.

300711.SZ.summary: GHT Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and servicing of ICT-related products in China and internationally. The company offers H20-20 program-controlled exchange, IP switching, railway digital dispatching communication, converged video, network management, and audio recording systems. It offers its solutions to the defense, electric power, railway, and industrial sectors. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Guangzhou, China.

300762.SZ.summary: Jushri Technologies Inc. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of military broadband mobile communication systems and tactical communication equipment. The company is also involved in the provision of communication technologies, and integrated information solutions for railway and urban rail transit. In addition, it offers electronic welfare system. The company's products are used in various military applications, including base station, relay, terminal, module, and system software. It has 33 patents and 67 software copyrights. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Shanghai, China.

3047.TW.summary: EDIMAX Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the design, development, manufacture, and marketing of networking solutions to SOHO and SME markets, and businesses in Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. It operates through Enterprise, Retail Products and Services; Telecommunication Products and Services; and Others segments. The company's products include whole home Wi-Fi systems, air quality monitoring systems, wireless routers, Wi-Fi range extenders, access points, Wi-Fi bridges, wireless adapters, powerline, home automation systems, network cameras, switches, ADSL modem routers, network adapters, print servers, KVM switches, Wi-Fi antennas, and legacy products. Its products also comprise EDIMAX pro, AP controllers, and SFP/Mini GBICs, as well as accessories; and indoor and semi-outdoor detection solutions, monitors, cable and cableless transmission equipment, xDSL routers, Ethernet switches, PoE solutions, powerline solutions, network access controllers, load balancer solutions, professional surveillance cameras, VoIP solutions, home entertainment integration solutions, and other customer-oriented networking applications. The company offers its products primarily through retail and online channels, resellers, and distributors. EDIMAX Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

3062.TW.summary: CyberTAN Technology, Inc. manufactures and sells broadband and wireless networking equipment for the small-office and home-office markets in Taiwan, China, and the United States. The company offers fixed broadband products, including broadband/DSL routers, cable gateways, and Wi-Fi AP bridges; mobile broadband products, such as 4G/LTE routers and satellite routers; voice over IP products comprising wired/wireless VoIP gateways, ADSL 2/2+ IAD, and VDSL2 IAD products; and wireless/SiP products consisting of wireless embedded modules, SiP modules, and IoT modules. It also provides digital home products, including DTA/IP/cable/satellite set-top-boxes and IoT gateways; and professional OEM/ODM services for the home networking and communications markets. CyberTAN Technology, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3138.TW.summary: Auden Techno Corp. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells various antennas in Taiwan and internationally. It is also involved in equipment marketing, and test and certification businesses. The company offers CB electronic antennas, mobile phone GSM antennas, and wireless local-area network antennas; ultra-wideband and RFID application antennas; and miniature multi-frequency antenna modules, as well as 4G LTE/MIMO technology and biological electromagnetic wave products. Its products are used in mobile communications, automotive electronics, Internet communications, and digital and industrial applications. In addition, the company provides development, testing, mass production, and after-sales services; and antenna simulation, and design and measurement services. Auden Techno Corp. was founded in 1981 and is based in Taoyuan, Taiwan.

3152.TWO.summary: Advanced Ceramic X Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells RF front-end devices and modules for wireless communication applications in Taiwan, China, the United States, Hong Kong, and internationally. It offers antenna switch modules; antennas; low pass, high pass, and band pass filters, as well as filter arrays; diplexers, triplexers, and saw-triplexers; baluns and baluns filters; couplers and couplers filters; power dividers; high frequency inductors; Bluetooth modules; and RF chip ceramic devices. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hsinchu County, Taiwan.

3209.TW.summary: Alltek Technology Corporation operates as a communication components distributor and solution provider in Taiwan and internationally. The company provides broadband access devices used in C/O products, computer devices, servers, modems, and network communication products; wireless communication devices for use in PC, NB, servers, auto control products, mobile devices, mobile phones, and portable consumer products; and optical devices for O/E, Internet, and network communication applications. It also offers voice processing devices for use in PC, NB, servers, O/E products, gateways, network communication products, and modems; and protection devices for use in O/E products, gateways, network communication products, and modems. In addition, the company provides self-developed products for ASIC, DAA, SLIC modules, pair gains, switch routers, power management devices, memory products, display drivers, and AIS applications, as well as time-to-market and value-added services. Alltek Technology Corporation was founded in 1991 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.

3363.TWO.summary: FOCI Fiber Optic Communications, Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets fiber optic components and integrated modules for communication networks in Taiwan. It offers interconnects, such as connector/adaptor parts, pigtails/patchcords, and patchpanels; couplers/splitters, attenuators, and wavelength division multiplexing (WDM) products; filter WDMs, CWDMs, DWDMs, and filter devices; optical isolators and circulators, including micro optic devices; optical transceivers and active optical cables; and USB 3.0 AOC cables, sub-assemblies, pigtails/receptacles, and detectors. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

3391.TWO.summary: Remotek Corporation engages in the research, design, production, and sale of radio coverage solutions for 2G, 3G, and 4G mobile radio networks worldwide. The company offers digital repeaters, including PICO ICS, ICS, digital fiber optic, and digital band adjustable repeaters; distributed antenna systems, such as fiber optic repeaters and cable boosters; and off air solutions comprising low and medium power repeaters, high power repeaters, channel selective repeaters, and frequency shifting repeaters. It also provides operation and maintenance system, a management system for controlling and monitoring repeaters remotely; and accessories, such as antennas, couplers, splitters, combiners, dummy loads, coaxial cables, and connectors. In addition, the company offers RF components and related services. It serves providers of mobile communication. Remotek Corporation was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

3419.TW.summary: Wha Yu Industrial Co., Ltd. provides antenna products for wireless transmission industry primarily in Taiwan and Hong Kong. It offers telecommunication BTS, in building coverage optimization, outdoor coverage optimization, GPS, automotive, Wi-Fi, LTE, DSRC, walkie talkie, various embedded, military, maritime, telematics, mmWave active, handheld game console, small cell, and dispenser antennas, as well as NFC antennas/modules, alarm devices, RFID products, electronic cable assemblies, and BSD blind spot detection radars. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3466.TWO.summary: Skardin Industrial Corporation, a consumer electronics manufacturing company, manufactures, supplies, and exports set top box and broadband industry solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers STB platforms, smart home products, WIFI speakers, hybrid soundbase and sound bar audio systems, and software/middleware products. The company also provides electronics manufacturing services. Skardin Industrial Corporation was founded in 1982 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3491.TWO.summary: Universal Microwave Technology, Inc. designs, develops, and manufactures custom microwave/mm-wave devices, sub-systems, and antennas for broadband wireless communications. The company's products comprise diplexers, filters, couplers, OMT products, Eband/millimeter-wave products, distributed antenna systems, hanger clamp sets, Ku/Ka band OMT and filter assemblies, waveguide components, circulators/isolators, cable assemblies, flexible waveguides, antennas, die-casting and machined parts, and remote mount kits. Its products are used in point-to-point, cellular, VSAT, WiMAX, and LTE applications. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Keelung City, Taiwan.

3558.TWO.summary: Senao Networks, Inc. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells wireless communication products in the United States, Europe, Taiwan, and internationally. The company offers wireless network Wi-Fi systems, including outdoor mesh wireless access points (APs)/repeaters, user-end mesh wireless APs/bridges, smart cloud network management services, smart mesh connection solutions, wireless network routers, smart home mesh wireless network routers, and enterprise wireless network management software. It also provides wired network system switches, such as large enterprises network security servers, small and medium-sized enterprises network security servers, medium and large-sized enterprises network security servers, managed network switches, managed network controllers, easy/smart network switches, layer2/3 managed network switches, PoE network cable power supplies, and electrical equipment for smart power supply. In addition, the company offers cloud management service and cloud device management platforms, cloud management service wireless network base stations, and cloud management service switches; enterprise radio system products comprising single-wire, high-speed, frequency-hopping, digital, and long-range enterprise cordless communication devices; and four-wire, multi-master, high-speed, frequency-hopping, digital, and long-range enterprise cordless communication systems, as well as AP CAMs, PoE/Ethernet power supply parts, antennas, and power supply products. Further, it is involved in the development of new generation of 6GHz wireless management base stations; cloud gateways; enterprise-grade video surveillance solution; Internet of Things/Industrial Internet of Things; outdoor wireless LTE bridge APs; IP-base long-range cordless phones; and integrated 900MHz digital cordless interphones. The company offers products under the Senao and EnGenius names. Senao Networks, Inc. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3596.TW.summary: Arcadyan Technology Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of wireless networking products, integrated access devices, digital home multimedia devices, and mobile broadband products worldwide. It operates in Networking Product and Digital Set-Top Box Product segments. The company provides various broadband access and digital home solutions, such as DSL CPEs, 802.11a/b/g/n client solutions, Wi-Fi modules, FTTx solutions, mobile broadband products, IP set-top boxes, power line communication products, etc. It also offers broadband/wireless/multimedia products for specialized design-in requirements, as well as add-on products to enhance products with wireless convenience. The company provides its solutions to telecom operators, ISPs, retailers, consumer electronic companies, and OEMs/ODMs. Arcadyan Technology Corporation was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3664.TWO.summary: Array Networks, Inc., a network functions platform company, provides purpose-built systems for hosting virtual networking and security functions worldwide. The company offers network functions platforms to enhance agility and operational efficiencies; application delivery controllers for server and link load balancing; and secure access gateways to control access to applications, desktops, files, networks, and Websites from a range of remote and mobile devices. It also provides platform ready 3rd-party ecosystems, as well as various App delivery and security solutions. In addition, the company offers SSL interceptor for encryption and decryption; Web application firewall for advanced security; monitoring and reporting system that transforms application traffic into actionable intelligence; and management platform to monitor and manage user behavior for analysis and audit purposes. It serves cloud service providers, software-as-a-service, enterprise, financial service, healthcare, and education industries, as well as local, state, and federal agencies. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Milpitas, California.

3694.TW.summary: AzureWave Technologies, Inc. manufactures and sells wireless connectivity and image processing solutions worldwide. The company offers wireless modules, including M.2 socket type, M.2 solder own, solder down stamp, wireless IOT module, and system in package products. It also provides camera modules, such as USB interface, MIPI interface, ultra slim and narrow NB, ultra slim and narrow MIPI, and biological identification/depth detection camera modules. In addition, the company offers design, manufacturing, and software services. Its products have applications in personal and industrial computers, mobile and internet devices, consumer electronics, home appliances, automotive components, manufacturing facilities, and others. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3704.TW.summary: Unizyx Holding Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides networking solutions for telecom operators, corporates, and home users worldwide. It offers consumer devices, remote central office equipment, wired and wireless equipment, and home and cloud equipment under the Zyxel brand and MitraStar names. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

3LO.F.summary: PowerFleet, Inc. provides wireless Internet-of-Things and machine-to-machine solutions in the United States, Israel, and internationally. The company offers industrial solutions, such as on-premise or in-facility asset and operator management, monitoring, and visibility for industrial trucks, such as forklifts, man-lifts, tuggers, and ground support equipment at airports. It also provides logistic solutions, including bumper-to-bumper asset management, monitoring, and visibility for heavy trucks, dry-van trailers, refrigerated trailers, shipping containers, etc., as well as associated cargos; and mobile-asset tracking and condition-monitoring solutions. In addition, the company offers vehicle solutions to enhance the vehicle fleet management process. Further, it provides hosting, maintenance, and support and consulting services; and Software as a Service, including system monitoring, help desk technical support, escalation procedure development, routine diagnostic data analysis, and software updates services. The company offers its products under the PowerFleet, Pointer, and Cellocator brands. It sells its products to commercial and government sectors in automotive manufacturing, retail, food and grocery distribution, pharmaceutical and medical distribution, logistics, shipping, freight transportation, heavy industry, wholesale distribution, manufacturing, aerospace and defense, homeland security, and vehicle rental markets, as well as through indirect sales channels, such as original equipment manufacturers, vehicle importers, distributors, and industrial equipment dealers. The company was formerly known as I.D. Systems, Inc. PowerFleet, Inc. was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Woodcliff Lake, New Jersey.

3TG.F.summary: Trigiant Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells feeder cables, optical fiber cables and related products, flame-retardant flexible cables, electronic components, and others for mobile communications and telecommunication equipment in the People's Republic of China. The company's Feeder Cable Series segment offers cables used in transmitting and receiving radio signals, as well as components for telecommunications transmission equipment; and leaky cables primarily used for wireless mobile communications, remote control, and alarm systems for transmitting radio frequency signals, as well as sending and receiving antenna data for areas of weak signal coverage, such as subways, tunnels, underground passages, and interior of buildings. Its Optical Fibre Cable Series and Related Products segment provides cables for use in long haul telecommunication transmission in fixed and wireless telecommunications networks. The company's Flame-Retardant Flexible Cable Series segment offers cables that are used as internal connection cables for power systems or mobile cable transmission, distribution systems, and communications switch systems requiring uninterrupted power. Its New-Type Electronic Components segment provides sensing products; optical splitters; jumpers for connection of wireless antennas with feeder cables and various communications equipment; and connectors for connection of radio frequency circuits to radio equipment and electronic devices, and antenna lightning arresters installed between a high frequency device and a feeder cable. The company's Others segment provides couplers, combiners, feeder wall plates, adjustable stands, waterproof clay, insulating tape, cable ties, and feeder hoisting grips. It exports its products to Brazil, India, Russia, the Middle East, South East Asia, etc. Trigiant Group Limited was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Yixing, the People's Republic of China.

3UB.F.summary: Ubiquiti Inc. develops networking technology for service providers, enterprises, and consumers. It develops technology platforms for high-capacity distributed Internet access, unified information technology, and consumer electronics for professional, home, and personal use. Its service provider product platforms offer carrier-class network infrastructure for fixed wireless broadband, wireless backhaul systems, and routing; and enterprise product platforms provide wireless LAN infrastructure, video surveillance products, switching and routing solutions, security gateways, and other WLAN products, as well as offers consumer products under the Ubiquiti Labs brand name. The company also provides technology platforms, such as airMAX, which include proprietary protocols that contain technologies for minimizing signal noise; EdgeMAX, a software and system routing platform; airFiber, a point-to-point radio system; and UFiber GPON, a plug and play fiber network technology to build high speed fiber internet networks. In addition, it offers UniFi -Enterprise WLAN, an enterprise Wi-Fi system that allows for on-site and remote management through the cloud; UniFi Protect, a video surveillance system, which provides statistical reporting and advanced analytics; UniFi Switch that deliver performance, switching, and power of Ethernet support for enterprise networks; and UniFi Security Gateway that provide routing and network security, as well as AmpliFi platform, a Wi-Fi system solution for connected homes. Further, Ubiquiti Inc. offers base stations, radios, and customer premise equipment; embedded radio products; antennas; and mounting brackets, cables, and power over Ethernet adapters. It serves customers through a network of approximately 100 distributors and online retailers worldwide. The company was formerly known as Ubiquiti Networks, Inc. and changed its name to Ubiquiti Inc. in August 2019. Ubiquiti Inc. was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in New York, New York.

4441.T.summary: Tobila Systems Inc. develops and provides fraud filtering systems in Japan. The company offers prank call filter services for mobile and business phones, as well as nuisance call filter services for landlines. It also provides other services, which include netcomfy, a content blocker application for iPhone; phone number.com, an online phonebook; and HP4U, a homepage production service that include coverage, photography, and production. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

4905.TWO.summary: Tainet Communication System Corp. provides carrier class access equipment to telecom carriers, service operators, and business users worldwide. The company offers Ethernet access devices, VoIP gateway products, xDSL and analog modems, PON, optical transceivers, and interface converters. It also provides copper over fiber connectivity, VoIP gateway communication, xDSL Ethernet, and TDM over IP communication solutions. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.

4906.TW.summary: Gemtek Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells wireless communications technologies and solutions in Taiwan and internationally. It offers wireless broadband products, including LTE portable routing products, indoor and outdoor routers, and micro base stations for individuals and families, as well as enterprises, factories, and other applications; and fixed broadband products, such as PON, xDSL/G.fast broadband, and DPU broadband hybrid fiber/copper wire distribution point unit products. The company also provides connected smart home products comprising full coverage seamless connection systems, ViTA smart controllers, and smart sensors; LoRa Internet of Things technologies and communication protocols; and joint design and manufacturing, as well as contract manufacturing services. In addition, it offers intelligent wireless system and vertical integration, smart vertical integration, LTE micro base station, and Internet of Things connection protocol solutions. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.

4980.TWO.summary: Jorjin Technologies Inc. provides modular processing, sensing, and wireless connectivity solutions worldwide. It also offers wireless system in package, application processor, imaging, and audio visual modules, as well as modules for the Internet of things; and driver software, as well as design-in support services. In addition, the company distributes a range of components, such as barcode scanning modules, filters, TCXOs, chip antennas, and EMI shielding components, as well as 2, 3, and 4G modems. It serves wearable consumer electronics, automotive infotainment, cloud connected devices, and industrial mobile computing markets. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5348.TWO.summary: TranSystem, Inc. designs and develops wireless communications products for the RF communications and GPS markets in Taiwan. The company offers wireless products, such as sDAS HEU, sDAS RAU, and digital MSB repeaters; DAS accessories, such as power dividers, antennas, and power over Ethernet; Wi-Fi products; MMDS downconverters, transceivers, and antennas; switching power supply with DC inserters; and WiMAX outdoor base station and outdoor CPE products. It also provides GPS products, including Bluetooth GPS products, software solutions for GPS data loggers, GPS data loggers, wired GPS products, active antennas, and engine boards, as well as tracking devices, and modules for embedded GPS applications. TranSystem, Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Miaoli, Taiwan.

5353.TWO.summary: Tailyn Technologies, Inc. engages in the design and manufacture of turnkey solutions for communication and applications sectors in Taiwan. The company offers industrial Ethernet switches comprising unmanaged, lite managed, and managed Ethernet switches; carrier Ethernet products; wireless LAN products; and telecom products. It also provides design, joint-development, manufacturing, associated engineering, and logistic support services. The company was formerly known as Tailyn Communication Company, Ltd. and changed its name to Tailyn Technologies, Inc. in July 2013. Tailyn Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

5388.TW.summary: Sercomm Corporation researches, develops, manufactures, and sells networking communication software and equipment worldwide. The company offers LTE/5G mobility solutions, including small cells, CBRS, private LTE, NB-IoT/LTE-M modules, and LTE/5G terminals; broadband access solutions, such as DOCSIS, FTTx, xDSL, broadband routers, and residential LTE/5G gateways; and IoT (Internet of Things) solutions comprising IP cameras, IoT gateways, mobile IoT devices, low power IoT sensors, and IoT cloud. It also provides enterprise equipment that include WiFi access points, business routers, switches, and IP phones; and home connectivity and entertainment products that include WiFi mesh repeaters, G.hn adapters, over-the-top set-top boxes, and smart speakers. In addition, the company offers consultation and customer services for computer information products; and sells IT products, communication products, and software. Further, it manufactures, servers, routers, OS, and related software. The company was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

5817.T.summary: JMACS Japan Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells instrumentation cables, control cables, communication cables, disaster prevention cables, optical fiber cables, performance cables, and processed harness products in Japan. It also offers smart system solutions, smart security systems, display systems for FA lines, software and hardware systems, industrial products, and lighting products. The company was formerly known as Nihon Electric Wire & Cable Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JMACS Japan Co., Ltd. in September 2015. The company was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

5AB.SI.summary: Trek 2000 International Ltd, an investment holding company, engages in the research, design, development, and dealing of computer hardware, software, electronic components, and other related products. The company operates through Interactive Customised Solutions, Interactive Consumer Solutions, and Licensing segments. It offers patented technology solutions, including USB, wireless, anti-piracy, compression, security/encryption, centralized management system, and PC and mobile apps products; and portable storage solutions, such as flash memory. The company also provides wireless solutions, including patient alert systems, Flucard, Flucard ultra, Ai-ball, smart gateway, and smart sensor for diapers; and ThumbDrive solutions, such as trek's smart meters, micro solid state devices, i solid state devices, ThumbDrive cloud, thumbdrive crypto, thumbdrive swipe, ThumbDrive SWAN, and chez solutions to protect crucial information, as well as secure transaction, identity, key, encryption, and storage flash drives. In addition, it is involved in the research and experimental development on medical technologies; research, design, development, and distribution of memory modules, and other related products and solutions; and development and marketing of Web portal services, including social networking sites. Further, the company provides design solutions, such as complete design-in modules or sub-modules in semi-customized or customized forms for software, hardware, and firmware; and security solutions for mobile storage devices, as well as licenses its patented technologies and trademarks. It operates in China/Hong Kong, Taiwan, India, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Europe, the United States, and internationally. Trek 2000 International Ltd was incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Singapore.

5BT.F.summary: Baylin Technologies Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells passive and active radio frequency (RF), and terrestrial microwave products and services. The company offers embedded antennas for use in smartphones, handsets, tablets, and other mobile devices; device-specific antenna designs for Wi-Fi routers; gateway devices for smart home connectivity, set-top boxes, and land mobile radio products; and indoor and outdoor distributed antenna systems, and small cell system antennas. It offers its products under the Galtronics, Advantech Wireless, Alga Microwave, and Mitec brands. The company serves the mobile, embedded, DAS, base station antenna, and small cell markets. It operates in the United States, Vietnam, China, South Korea, Singapore, Sweden, the United Kingdom, Canada, Taiwan, Russia, India, Romania, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in North York, Canada.

5BT.SG.summary: Baylin Technologies Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells passive and active radio frequency (RF), and terrestrial microwave products and services. The company offers embedded antennas for use in smartphones, handsets, tablets, and other mobile devices; device-specific antenna designs for Wi-Fi routers; gateway devices for smart home connectivity, set-top boxes, and land mobile radio products; and indoor and outdoor distributed antenna systems, and small cell system antennas. It offers its products under the Galtronics, Advantech Wireless, Alga Microwave, and Mitec brands. The company serves the mobile, embedded, DAS, base station antenna, and small cell markets. It operates in the United States, Vietnam, China, South Korea, Singapore, Sweden, the United Kingdom, Canada, Taiwan, Russia, India, Romania, and internationally. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in North York, Canada.

5TK.F.summary: AgJunction Inc. develops, sells, and licenses hardware and software solutions for precision agriculture applications worldwide. Its products and solutions offer precision guidance and positioning, autosteering, and machine automation for off-road markets with application to farming operations, such as tilling, planting, spraying, and harvesting. The company provides Wheelman white-label, an autosteering platform for manufacturers and suppliers; Electronic Control Units family support modules for autosteering, hydraulic control, machine learning, diagnostic system, and sensor fusion applications; Mechanical Drive Units family that allow manufacturers and suppliers to integrate autosteering on vehicles that do not have manufacturing autosteering interfaces; and terminals, GNSS, and kits that are provided to support manufacturers' and  suppliers' requirements. It also offers RANGER, a GPS guidance solution; and Wheelman autosteering systems, such as Wheelman Pro, Wheelman Flex, Wheelman Pro HP, Wheelman Flex HP, and Whirl software for farmers to steer farm equipment. In addition, the company also provides cloud infrastructure services that include cloud data storage, subscription management, over-the-air update management, and remote support. It markets its solutions under the Novariant, HandsFreeFarm, Wheelman, and Whirl brands through manufacturers, suppliers, and direct-to-farmer, as well as its ecommerce platform, HandsFreeFarm.com. The company was formerly known as Hemisphere GPS Inc. and changed its name to AgJunction Inc. in May 2013. AgJunction Inc. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona.

5TL.F.summary: Cogelec SA manufactures intercoms and access control solutions for residential apartment buildings and single-family dwellings. Its serves collective housing, such as social or private, parking, etc.; individual housing; tertiary sector; and local authorities under the Intratone, Hexact, Kibolt, and Filies Armine brands. The company offers its products in 12 countries in Europe. Cogelec SA was founded in 2000 and is based in Mortagne-sur-Svre, France.

600105.SS.summary: Jiangsu Etern Company Limited operates in communication cable industry. It offers optical, data, coaxial, and city cables; optical fibers; wires; optical devices; and communication devices and equipment, as well as communication large data and engineering services and system integration solutions. The company also provides data business support platform and after sales services. Jiangsu Etern Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Suzhou, China.

600198.SS.summary: Datang Telecom Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the integrated circuit (IC) design, software and services, terminal design, and mobile Internet sectors in China. The company offers products and services in the areas of IC design, including intelligent terminal, smart security, and automotive electronic chips; terminal design, smartphone, data terminal, and industry terminal services; and smart cards, car networking, sensor networks, and video surveillance products. The company also offers software and services consisting of telecom operation support systems, information security solutions, and platform products; communication devices for wired and wireless access, and optical communication products; and energy saving products. In addition, it provides security chip and mobile terminal solutions for IC design; wireless access and BOSS solutions for operators; smart city and traffic solutions; and smart business center and wisdom tourism products, as well as traffic, agriculture, water, education, energy, and multi-service convergence scheduling platform for industrial applications, and mobile Internet and government information solutions for public services. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

600260.SS.summary: Kaile Science and Technology Co;Ltd.Hubei operates in the communications industry in China. The company offers civil and military products, including optical fibers, optical cables, data cables, quantum communication data link products, and intelligence terminal products; electrical cables; and pipe, profiles, and geosynthetic products. It also operates autonomous controllable computing platforms; intelligent accusation terminals; and other civilian and military products, as well as communication silicon tubes, smart phones, wearable products, security positioning equipment, medical information platform, radar, non-standard military products, etc. In addition, the company offers Internet products, including Internet + medical, Internet + Network security, Internet + finance, Internet + real estate marketing, and others. Further, it operates as a service provider for software and hardware manufacturing of high-end communication equipment in the informatization industry; and three industrial parks with a gross floor area of approximately 1,800 mu. The company was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Jingzhou, China.

600345.SS.long_name: WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd
600345.SS.summary: WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd engages in the investment, research and development, manufacture, and sale of communications products in China. The company offers optical transmission equipment, access network equipment, optical fibers and cables, wireless communications systems and equipment, base station radiofrequency cables, digital video equipment, communication equipment, precise structure products, and optical memory products, as well as relevant software. It is also involved in the integration of communications and information systems; and provision of technical services. WuHan Yangtze Communication Industry Group Co.,Ltd was founded in 1996 and is based in Wuhan, China.

600355.SS.summary: Routon Electronic Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and service of electronic terminals in China. The company offers GPS navigation devices, public payphones, e-transaction systems, and public communication terminals. It also operates in South Eastern Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and South America. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

600487.SS.summary: Hengtong Optic-Electric Co., Ltd. operates in fiber optic communications industry in China and internationally. It offers fiber optic network, quantum security communication, and ocean observation network products; power transmission products; smart ocean system solutions; rail transit solutions; smart city solutions; and big data systems. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Suzhou, China.

600498.SS.summary: Fiberhome Telecommunication Technologies Co., Ltd. provides information and communication network products and solutions in China. The company offers carrier solutions, such as optical network, broadband access, carrier IP, boss, IPTV+OTT, broadband CPE, IT infrastructure, ODN, optical fiber and cable, submarine network system, overhead line, copper cable, and SDN/NFV. It also provides cloud computing, big data, modular data center, server/storage, switch/router, overhead line, access, video surveillance, application software, and mobility products. In addition, the company offers network deployment, consulting, service quality, network support, interactive network, knowledge transfer, management, and information integration services. It serves smart city, transportation, government, public safety, post, education, finance, cloud access, cloud video surveillance, and IDC sectors. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Wuhan, China.

600745.SS.summary: Wingtech Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, and manufacture of artificial intelligence, IoT, smart phone, notebook, intelligent hardware, laptop, automotive electronic, and other intelligent hardware products worldwide. The company develops and produces mobile phones, tablets, and other intelligent terminals. It also provides virtual reality (VR)/AR machine manufacturing services, including hardware platform development, optical design and structural design, low level software development and system optimization, VR automatic production, and other services. In addition, the company offers a 4G/5G intelligent terminals research and development platform; and engages in the real estate business. The company was formerly known as Join-In (Holding) Co.,Ltd. Wingtech Technology Co.,Ltd is based in Jiaxing, China.

600775.SS.summary: Nanjing Panda Electronics Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of electronic equipment, electronic computer fitting, office machinery, and tooling products in the People's Republic of China. The company operates through Smart City Industry, Electronic Manufacturing Service, Intelligent Manufacturing Industry, and Others segments. It offers radio communication equipment, radio and television equipment, hardware and electrical equipment, electronic components, instrument and apparatus, electrical machinery, standard and electrical machinery, and medical equipment products. The company manufactures and sells automatic transmission equipment and industrial robots; railway transit auto fare collection (AFC) and AFC clearing center system equipment, building intellectualization products, and system integration; and mobile communications, digital communications, and network communication systems and products. It also manufactures general purpose equipment, communications equipment, and digital products, as well as provides software development, property management, and catering services. The company was founded in 1936 and is based in Nanjing, the People's Republic of China.

600990.SS.long_name: Anhui Sun Create Electronics Co., Ltd
600990.SS.summary: Anhui Sun Create Electronics Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and marketing of radar and security systems in China and internationally. The company offers meteorological radar systems, such as weather surveillance and security systems; and air traffic management systems comprising doppler weather radars, wind profilers, ATC radars, etc. It also provides urban security systems, including VIP protection, low altitude surveillance, ground surveillance, communication, and decision-making and command systems; and photovoltaic products, as well as miniature perimeter monitoring radar system. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hefei, China.

601138.SS.summary: Foxconn Industrial Internet Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacturing, and sale of communication network equipment, cloud service equipment, precision tools, and industrial robots. Its communication network equipment products include network equipment, such as network switches, routers, wireless devices, network servers, set-top boxes, smart home gateways; telecommunication equipment comprising mobile base stations, optical transmission equipment; and high-precision communication network equipment, as well as offers machine components consisting of smart phone high-precision metal and polymer machine components, network telecommunication equipment, high-precision machine components. The company also provides cloud computing products, including tower servers, rack servers, blade servers; storage devices and servers; and storage cabinets. In addition, the company offers precision tools solution, including diamond cutters, tungsten carbide cutters, and micro thread forming taps, as well as offers tool development, production systems, blade design, mass production, precision coating, and application testing. Its products are used in smart phones, broadband and wireless networks, infrastructure construction of multimedia service operators and telecom operators, terminal products required by Internet value-added service providers, infrastructure of enterprise networks and data centers, precision core components, automated intelligent manufacturing, etc. The company is based in Shenzhen, China. Foxconn Industrial Internet Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hon Hai Precision Industry Co., Ltd.

601869.SS.long_name: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company
601869.SS.summary: Yangtze Optical Fibre And Cable Joint Stock Limited Company manufactures and sells optical fiber and cable products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Optical Fibres and Optical Fibre Preforms, and Optical Fibre Cables segments. It offers communication optical fibers, cable products, specialty fibers, integrated cabling products, optical distribution frames, optical transceivers, coaxial cables, and cable manufacturing equipment. The company also provides copper wire and related products; integrated wiring systems; germanium tetrachlorides for optical fibers; technical development consulting services for computer hardware and software and ancillary equipment; and vapor and chemical raw materials. In addition, it offers solutions to telecom operators, cloud and data centers, smart campus, railway transportation, education, power grids, and consumer electronics, as well as the government. Further, the company imports, exports, and sells submarine cables, optical cables, and other power cables and their accessories, as well as trades in raw materials; and installs cables, accessories, and systems related to various submarine projects.
